## Authorize() function

Used for setting required permission name for authentication

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Authorize(permission: string): <TFunction extends Function>(target: TFunction) => TFunction;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  permission | <code>string</code> | Name of requested permission, that is used for displaying of component |

<b>Returns:</b>

`<TFunction extends Function>(target: TFunction) => TFunction`
